docs.title: 🚀 Quickstart
docs.text: Welcome to the OpenAI Quickstart guide! Get up and running with OpenAI APIs in minutes with practical examples and step-by-step instructions.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Setting up your OpenAI API key
  • Making your first API call
  • Understanding basic concepts
  • Common patterns and best practices

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
Prerequisites

  • Basic programming knowledge (Python, JavaScript, or similar)
  • An OpenAI account and API key
  • A code editor or development environment

docs.title: 🎯 First Steps
docs.text:
• Your First API Call
  • Understanding Responses
  • Error Handling Basics

docs.title: 🛠️ Tools & Resources
docs.text:
• Development Tools
  • Debugging Tips
  • Next Steps

Ready to dive deeper?

Once you've completed the quickstart, explore Model Inference to learn advanced techniques for working with OpenAI models.

docs.title: 🤖 Model Inference
docs.text: Learn how to effectively run and interact with OpenAI models. Master the art of prompting, understanding model outputs, and optimizing performance.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Different OpenAI models and their capabilities
  • Advanced prompting techniques
  • Parameter tuning and optimization
  • Streaming responses and real-time interactions

docs.title: Model Overview
docs.text:
Available Models

Explore the full range of OpenAI models including GPT-4, GPT-3.5, DALL-E, Whisper, and more.

docs.title: 🎯 Specialized Use Cases
docs.text:
• Text Generation
  • Code Generation
  • Image Generation
  • Audio Processing

Next Steps

Ready to customize models for your specific needs? Explore Model Customization to learn about fine-tuning and adaptation techniques.

docs.title: 🧰 Model Customization
docs.text: Learn how to fine-tune and customize OpenAI models for your specific use cases. Master the techniques for creating domain-specific AI solutions.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Fine-tuning strategies and best practices
  • Data preparation and preprocessing
  • Custom model training workflows
  • Model adaptation techniques

docs.title: Customization Methods
docs.text:
Prerequisites

Before customizing models, ensure you have completed the Quickstart and Model Inference sections.

docs.title: 💡 Advanced Techniques
docs.text:
• Parameter-Efficient Training
  • Reinforcement Learning
  • Constitutional AI

Ready to measure performance?

Learn how to evaluate and improve your customized models in Model Evaluation.

docs.title: 📊 Model Evaluation
docs.text: Master the art of measuring and improving model performance. Learn comprehensive evaluation techniques and metrics for AI systems.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Evaluation methodologies and frameworks
  • Performance metrics and benchmarks
  • Testing strategies and validation
  • Continuous improvement processes

docs.title: Evaluation Framework
docs.text:
Holistic Evaluation

Effective model evaluation goes beyond accuracy - consider safety, bias, robustness, and real-world performance.

docs.title: 🎪 Human Evaluation
docs.text:
• Human-in-the-Loop
  • Expert Review
  • User Studies
  • Crowdsource Evaluation

Building Intelligent Agents?

Explore how to create autonomous AI systems in Agentic AI.

docs.title: 🎯 Agentic AI
docs.text: Build autonomous AI agents that can reason, plan, and take action. Learn to create intelligent systems that work independently and collaboratively.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Agent architectures and design patterns
  • Planning and reasoning frameworks
  • Tool integration and multi-modal capabilities
  • Multi-agent systems and collaboration

docs.title: Agent Fundamentals
docs.text:
What are AI Agents?

AI agents are autonomous systems that can perceive their environment, make decisions, and take actions to achieve specific goals.

docs.title: 🛡️ Safety & Ethics
docs.text:
• Agent Safety
  • Ethical Considerations
  • Alignment Problems
  • Control Mechanisms

Ready for cutting-edge techniques?

Explore the frontier of AI research and development in Advanced Topics.

docs.title: 👩🏽‍💻 Advanced Topics �‍💻 Advanced Topics
docs.text: Explore cutting-edge AI research, experimental techniques, and emerging trends in artificial intelligence. Push the boundaries of what's possible.

docs.title: What You'll Learn
docs.text:
• Latest research developments and trends
  • Experimental techniques and methodologies
  • Advanced AI architectures and paradigms
  • Future directions and emerging technologies

docs.title: Research Frontiers
docs.text:
Advanced Content

This section covers experimental and research-level topics. Some techniques may be unstable or require significant expertise.

docs.title: 📚 Academic Resources
docs.text:
• Research Papers
  • Conferences & Venues
  • Academic Collaborations
  • Publication Guidelines

Join the Research Community

Connect with researchers, share your work, and contribute to the advancement of AI technology. The future of AI is being built by communities like ours.
